subdisciplines.name: Linguistic Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of language and how it shapes culture.

subdisciplines.name: Ecological Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how humans interact with their environment.

subdisciplines.name: Economic Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how economics and culture interact.

subdisciplines.name: Political Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of political systems and their relationship with culture.

subdisciplines.name: Medical Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of health and illness from a cross-cultural perspective
